original_title: Apple watch owners score a win in blood oxygen battle | Fox News
article_summary: Apple Watch users in the U.S. can now update their devices to access a redesigned Blood Oxygen feature. The update, following a legal victory, affects Series 9, Series 10, and Apple Watch Ultra 2 models. Instead of processing data directly on the watch, measurements will be calculated on the paired iPhone and displayed in the Respiratory section of the Health app.</s>
